title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os
import openai
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv


_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv()) # read local .env file
openai.api_key  = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']

title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os

import pandas as pd
